languages.text: "Серфы в красных платках ворвались в часовню, начали стрелять... Их главарь направился к реликвии — останкам почтенных Вольных Торговцев, перенесенным сюда из оскверненной мутантами крипты... И когда я понял, что священный прах ваших предков вот-вот окажется в грязных руках еретика… задумавшего надругаться над славной династией... Нет, этого нельзя было допустить! Я... преградил ему путь..." {n}Фактотум ненадолго прикрывает глаза, собираясь с силами.{/n} "Выродок позволил себе несколько гнусных оскорблений в мой адрес, кои я осмелюсь опустить, но я не поддался на провокацию, надеясь, что смогу потянуть время".

traits.locale_text: "Серфы в красных платках ворвались в часовню, начали стрелять... Их главарь направился к реликвии — останкам почтенных Вольных Торговцев, перенесенным сюда из оскверненной мутантами крипты... И когда я понял, что священный прах ваших предков вот-вот окажется в грязных руках еретика… задумавшего надругаться над славной династией... Нет, этого нельзя было допустить! Я... преградил ему путь..." {n}Фактотум ненадолго прикрывает глаза, собираясь с силами.{/n} "Выродок позволил себе несколько гнусных оскорблений в мой адрес, кои я осмелюсь опустить, но я не поддался на провокацию, надеясь, что смогу потянуть время".

languages.text: "Serfs in red headscarves burst into the chapel and started shooting... Their leader made for the relic — the remains of honourable Rogue Traders brought here from the mutant-sullied crypt... And when I realised that the sacred ashes of your ancestors were about to fall into the filthy hands of a heretic... one intent on desecrating the glorious dynasty... No, that could not be allowed to happen! I... blocked his path..." {n}Janris briefly closes his eyes, gathering his strength.{/n} "The bastard allowed himself a few vile insults against me, which I am obliged to omit, but I did not give in to the provocation. I was hoping to buy myself some time."
languages.original_text: "Серфы в красных платках ворвались в часовню, начали стрелять... And when I realised that the sacred ashes of your ancestors were about to fall into the filthy hands of a heretic... one intent on desecrating the glorious dynasty... No, that could not be allowed to happen! I... blocked his path..." {n}Janris briefly closes his eyes, gathering his strength.{/n} "The bastard allowed himself a few vile insults against me, which I am obliged to omit, but I did not give in to the provocation. I was hoping to buy myself some time."

languages.text: "Sklaven mit roten Kopftüchern stürmten in die Kapelle und eröffneten das Feuer ... Ihr Anführer lief auf das Relikt zu ... die sterblichen Überreste ehrbarer Freihändler, die aus der mutantenverseuchten Krypta hierher gebracht worden waren ... Und als ich erkannte, dass die heilige Asche Eurer Ahnen in die schmutzigen Hände eines Ketzers fallen würden ... eines Ketzers, der die ruhmreiche Dynastie entweihen wollte ... Nein, das durfte ich nicht zulassen. Also ... blockierte ich seinen Weg ...!" {n}Janris schließt kurz die Augen, um Kraft zu sammeln.{/n} "Der Bastard hat mir Beleidigungen an den Kopf geworfen, auf die ich nicht näher eingehen will, aber ich habe der Provokation nicht nachgegeben. Ich wollte mir etwas Zeit verschaffen."
languages.original_text: "Serfs in red headscarves burst into the chapel and started shooting... Their leader made for the relic — the remains of honourable Rogue Traders brought here from the mutant-sullied crypt... And when I realised that the sacred ashes of your ancestors were about to fall into the filthy hands of a heretic... one intent on desecrating the glorious dynasty... No, that could not be allowed to happen! Und als ich erkannte, dass die heilige Asche Eurer Ahnen in die schmutzigen Hände eines Ketzers fallen würden ... eines Ketzers, der die ruhmreiche Dynastie entweihen wollte ... Nein, das durfte ich nicht zulassen. Ich wollte mir etwas Zeit verschaffen."

languages.text: «Unos sirvientes con pañuelos rojos irrumpieron en la capilla y se liaron a tiros... Su líder buscaba hacerse con la reliquia, los restos de los venerables Comerciantes Independientes que habíamos traído de la cripta profanada por los mutantes... Cuando me di cuenta de que las cenizas sagradas de sus antepasados estaban a punto de caer en manos de un hereje decidido a mancillar la gloriosa dinastía... ¡No podía permitirlo! Me... interpuse en su camino...». {n}Janris cierra brevemente los ojos y hace acopio de fuerzas.{/n} «El malnacido me lanzó toda clase de improperios que me abstendré de repetir, pero no cedí a sus provocaciones. Buscaba ganar tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Serfs in red headscarves burst into the chapel and started shooting... Their leader made for the relic — the remains of honourable Rogue Traders brought here from the mutant-sullied crypt... And when I realised that the sacred ashes of your ancestors were about to fall into the filthy hands of a heretic... one intent on desecrating the glorious dynasty... No, that could not be allowed to happen! I... blocked his path..." {n}Janris briefly closes his eyes, gathering his strength.{/n} "The bastard allowed himself a few vile insults against me, which I am obliged to omit, but I did not give in to the provocation. I was hoping to buy myself some time."

traits.locale_text: «Unos sirvientes con pañuelos rojos irrumpieron en la capilla y se liaron a tiros... Su líder buscaba hacerse con la reliquia, los restos de los venerables Comerciantes Independientes que habíamos traído de la cripta profanada por los mutantes... Cuando me di cuenta de que las cenizas sagradas de sus antepasados estaban a punto de caer en manos de un hereje decidido a mancillar la gloriosa dinastía... ¡No podía permitirlo! Me... interpuse en su camino...». {n}Janris cierra brevemente los ojos y hace acopio de fuerzas.{/n} «El malnacido me lanzó toda clase de improperios que me abstendré de repetir, pero no cedí a sus provocaciones. Buscaba ganar tiempo».

languages.text: 「赤いスカーフを身につけた農奴たちが礼拝堂に乱入し、銃を乱射し始めました。彼らのリーダーは聖遺物を、変異体によって穢された墓地からここに運ばれた、栄誉ある自由開拓者の遺体を狙っていたのです。あなたの父祖が残した神聖な灰が異端者の汚れた手に…栄光ある王朝を冒涜しようとする者の手に渡ろうとしていることに気づき…いや、そんなこと、許せるはずがない！私は…奴の行く手を阻んで…」{n}ジャンリスは一瞬目を閉じて、気力をかき集める。{/n}「あの野郎は私に対して…内容は省略しますが、下品な侮辱を口にしました。ですが、私はその挑発に屈しませんでした。時間を稼ぐ必要がありましたからね」
languages.original_text: "Serfs in red headscarves burst into the chapel and started shooting... Their leader made for the relic — the remains of honourable Rogue Traders brought here from the mutant-sullied crypt... And when I realised that the sacred ashes of your ancestors were about to fall into the filthy hands of a heretic... one intent on desecrating the glorious dynasty... No, that could not be allowed to happen! I... blocked his path..." {n}Janris briefly closes his eyes, gathering his strength.{/n} "The bastard allowed himself a few vile insults against me, which I am obliged to omit, but I did not give in to the provocation. I was hoping to buy myself some time."

traits.locale_text: 「赤いスカーフを身につけた農奴たちが礼拝堂に乱入し、銃を乱射し始めました。彼らのリーダーは聖遺物を、変異体によって穢された墓地からここに運ばれた、栄誉ある自由開拓者の遺体を狙っていたのです。あなたの父祖が残した神聖な灰が異端者の汚れた手に…栄光ある王朝を冒涜しようとする者の手に渡ろうとしていることに気づき…いや、そんなこと、許せるはずがない！私は…奴の行く手を阻んで…」{n}ジャンリスは一瞬目を閉じて、気力をかき集める。{/n}「あの野郎は私に対して…内容は省略しますが、下品な侮辱を口にしました。ですが、私はその挑発に屈しませんでした。時間を稼ぐ必要がありましたからね」

languages.text: “一群戴着红色头巾的仆役冲进了礼拜堂，开始胡乱开枪……他们的首领朝圣物走了过去，打算夺走列位行商浪人的伟大遗骸，带回被变种人玷污的地下墓穴里……我意识到，您祖先的圣灰马上要落入异端分子的脏手里……他打算亵渎王朝的荣耀……我绝不能允许这种事情发生！我……挡住了他的去路……”{n}詹里斯稍微闭了闭眼睛，缓了口气。{/n}“那个混蛋以卑劣的方式侮辱了我，而我不得不无视他的胡说八道。我并没有被他的挑衅激怒，我想尽量争取些时间。”
languages.original_text: "Serfs in red headscarves burst into the chapel and started shooting... Their leader made for the relic — the remains of honourable Rogue Traders brought here from the mutant-sullied crypt... And when I realised that the sacred ashes of your ancestors were about to fall into the filthy hands of a heretic... one intent on desecrating the glorious dynasty... No, that could not be allowed to happen! I... blocked his path..." {n}Janris briefly closes his eyes, gathering his strength.{/n} "The bastard allowed himself a few vile insults against me, which I am obliged to omit, but I did not give in to the provocation. I was hoping to buy myself some time."

languages.text: « Des serfs affublés de turbans rouges ont fait irruption dans la chapelle et ont commencé à tirer... Leur chef s'est précipité sur la relique, les augustes dépouilles des libres-marchands arrachées à la crypte souillée par les mutants... Et quand j'ai compris que les cendres sacrées de vos ancêtres étaient sur le point de tomber entre les mains crasseuses d'un hérétique... que dis-je, d'un désaxé cherchant à profaner votre glorieuse dynastie... Non, cette seule pensée m'était intolérable ! Je... je me suis interposé... » {n}Janris ferme brièvement les yeux comme pour rassembler ses forces.{/n} « Ce misérable s'est permis de me cracher des injures à la face, injures que je me dois de passer sous silence, mais je n'ai pas cédé à la provocation. J'espérais gagner du temps. »
languages.original_text: "Serfs in red headscarves burst into the chapel and started shooting... Their leader made for the relic — the remains of honourable Rogue Traders brought here from the mutant-sullied crypt... And when I realised that the sacred ashes of your ancestors were about to fall into the filthy hands of a heretic... one intent on desecrating the glorious dynasty... No, that could not be allowed to happen! I... blocked his path..." {n}Janris briefly closes his eyes, gathering his strength.{/n} "The bastard allowed himself a few vile insults against me, which I am obliged to omit, but I did not give in to the provocation. I was hoping to buy myself some time."

Et quand j'ai compris que les cendres sacrées de vos ancêtres étaient sur le point de tomber entre les mains crasseuses d'un hérétique... que dis-je, d'un désaxé cherchant à profaner votre glorieuse dynastie... J'espérais gagner du temps. »

languages.text: "Kızıl sarıklı köleler, şapele dalıp ateş etmeye başladı. Liderleri yadigârı ele geçirmek istiyordu. Mutantların kirlettiği mahzenden alınıp buraya getirilen muhterem Hür Tacirlerin kalıntılarını... Atalarınızın kutsal küllerinin, hanedanlığın görkemine leke sürmek isteyen bir kâfirin pis ellerine geçmek üzere olduğunu fark ettiğimde... Hayır, bunun olmasına izin verilemezdi! Onun... Yolunu kapattım." {n}Janris kısa bir süreliğine gözlerini kapatarak gücünü topluyor.{/n} "Şerefsiz bana karşı bazı ağza alınmaz hakaretler sarf etme hakkını kendinde gördü, ki bunları duymazdan gelmek benim yükümlülüğümdür ve provokasyona kulak asmadım. Benim umudum biraz zaman kazanmaktı."
languages.original_text: "Serfs in red headscarves burst into the chapel and started shooting... Their leader made for the relic — the remains of honourable Rogue Traders brought here from the mutant-sullied crypt... And when I realised that the sacred ashes of your ancestors were about to fall into the filthy hands of a heretic... one intent on desecrating the glorious dynasty... No, that could not be allowed to happen! I... blocked his path..." {n}Janris briefly closes his eyes, gathering his strength.{/n} "The bastard allowed himself a few vile insults against me, which I am obliged to omit, but I did not give in to the provocation. I was hoping to buy myself some time."
